amendment.description: Amendment sets the effective date of certain provisions of the CARD Act of 2009 to coincide with the enactment date of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 111-326 to set the effective date of certain provisions of the CARD Act of 2009 to the enactment date of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maffei amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 174 (Roll no. 847).
